alert.note: Alert for White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 11:41AM EST until February 19 at 11:30PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern Indiana, including the following county, White. * WHEN...Until 700 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1140 AM EST, an upstream floodgate release is expected to cause flooding in Monticello, located 2 and a half miles south of the dam. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Tippecanoe River, Pike Creek and Big Creek. Flooding is occurring along the Tippecanoe River. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Monticello, Golden Hill, Cedar Point and Norway. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
